Hope you are doing well.

 

As a last mile B2C, we are going to start work with Tiffany Brand and as you know Tiffany is jewelry and High jewelry brand, for example some times the items maybe exceeded 40K,50K.

 

So from point of insurance, can you please inform if Tiffany under insurance coverage for full amounts or not.

 

Thanks in advance and waiting your promote advise.

 

Regards

 

AHMED BADAWY​​​​
